titles.title: Federal Benefits Fairness and Restoration Act of 2016

To amend the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the denial of assistance and benefits for individuals with certain drug-related convictions, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Federal Benefits Fairness and Restoration Act of 2016
This bill amends the Personal Responsibility and Work Opportunity Reconciliation Act of 1996 to repeal the denial of assistance and benefits for certain drug-related convictions.
